Biography

2009-10: Averaged 5.4 points and 4.4 rebounds a game as a senior ... Started 18 of the 23 contests he appeared in. 2008-09: Averaged 5.7 points and 2.7 rebounds a contest while playing 17.3 minutes a game ... Started 12 of Averett's 30 games ... Shot 51.6 percent (79-for-153) from the floor ... Scored a career-high 14 points against Shenandoah University on Feb. 15. 2007-08: Started two of the 29 games he played in as a sophomore ... Averaged 2.5 points and 2.4 rebounds a game ... 2006-07: Played in 26 games as a freshman ... Averaged 1.2 points and 1.2 rebounds a game.

Personal: Son of Jerry and Anne Miller ... Majoring in Finance ... Born on Jan. 26, 1988.
